item.description:
News: The Weather Bumblers are predicting very wet weather from Friday night to
Sunday night with the worst weather being on Saturday night. I live only a few blocks
Away from Look At Me Now driving a SUV so I can get there in very wet weather.
I will keep an eye on the weather this weekend. If it is too bad then
I will encourage anyone who is not local to consider the weather risk and
Stay home if it is too dangerous.

I can have more Unknown Zone Only Meet Ups at other times and at other
Locations.

The weather might also be a factor for Sunday's Meet Up.
I might not have time to send a memo on that until later on tonight.

Sandra, poetry author, said that she is coming on Saturday
She will show me a cover of her most recent book so I will
Write something about it when I know more about it.
End of news memo.

Saturday the 6th now - Change in Date.

Unknown Zoners will have a night of discussing various
Conspiracy Topics.

Some of the topics will be TWA 800 Air Craft Crash,
Secret Societies, different assassinations
New World Order and a few other topics.

I tape Coast to Coast shows, so in my SUV right now
Is a tape of George Noorey talking to authors of
TWA 800 Books on the 10 year Anniversary in
JULY 2006.

http://www.coasttocoa...

www.coasttocoastam.com/shows/2006/07/17.html

Members are encouraged to bring their own curiosity and
Some topics of their own.

I will mention events on the current calendar and do members
Want other events in the up coming weeks and months.

We have not had a real Unknown Zone meeting for a long
Time because no one has been showing up for anything.

Please note the change from Wednesday to Saturday.
There was hardly any interest in Wednesday.
Lori - Look at Me Now
and
Glen - Catch a Healthy Habit
will be more available on Saturday the
Sixth.

Car pooling is encouraged.

I am not putting this Meet Up on any other Meet Up
Calendars. I have mentioned it briefly as a UZ Only Meeting.

I hope that we can have more Unknown Zone only Meet Ups
So that we can discuss Conspiracy, Paranormal and Current
Event Topics in more Private Settings (Not members houses).

Glen from Catch a Healthy Habit said that he will be
available so that members can
buy his smoothies and other types of Healthy Food.

Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Loris store. I was using that parking area over a decade ago
Long before Lori even moved into that store.

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony s Pizza Italian Restaurant
(Restaurant has had a few different names over the years
But this is its latest name.
Marc Anthony workers/owner has invited us to have some
Meet Ups there as well.).
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony s.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Lori s store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left. Loris store is a few stores in.

If you all, not counting those out of state or far away, do not
Attend any events, then why should I even have a Meet Up Group?

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Lori Larsen and myself will be POCs.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: What Do You Want To Know? on Sept. 6
